//OnBoarding VPN Detected! A VPN connection has been detected on your device. Disable the VPN connection before proceeding to ensure security Okay Welcome to Fino Payments bank Existing Customer? Login Start banking with us by login to FinoPay App. New to Bank? Open an Account Instant account opening, earn while you spend, Personalized debit card & so on. Verify Mobile Number Send SMS Please send us the pre-composed SMS to verify your mobile number If you have Dual SIM Select SIM linked to your Aadhaar card Standard SMS Charges may apply This may take a few seconds. Please don\'t exit the app or press the back button. is linked to a FinoPay account. Please wait while we verify your mobile number Redirecting Switch SIM Open Account Digital Account Opening Skip Let\'s get started Enter Referral Code (Optional) Enter referee mobile number Enable sweep account I hearby give my consent to FinoPayments Bank to enable my sweep account facility with Suryoday Small Finance Bank (SSFB) linked with my Fino Bank account. I also provide my explicit consent to FinoPayments Bank to share my KYC information with SSFB Get OTP Validate Your Identity Welcome You’re already one of our valued customers Register on the FinoPay App now and experience the future of digital banking. Register Now Verify OTP Enter the OTP sent to Mins Resend OTP We will send you an OTP to verify your Email ID Enter Email Id Email ID already registered! Enter your Aadhaar and PAN Details Enter Aadhaar number* Enter PAN number* Politically exposed person Use Aadhaar for Payments (AePS) Enable Disable FATCA Declaration I hereby provide my consent to Fino Payments Bank to fetch my KYC details using Aadhaar from UIDAI and validate my PAN from NSDL for the purpose of account opening. I have not opened Aadhaar OTP based account with any other bank in India and will not apply for it in future as well I, give my consent to download my KYC Records from the Central KYC Registry (CKYCR), only for the purpose of verification of my identity and address from the database of CKYCR Registry. I hereby give my explicit consent to Fino Payments Bank for Enabling Aeps Debit Service in my account. I confirm that the Aeps product features along with terms and conditions have been explained to me in detail and I agree to all the terms and conditions. Aadhaar and PAN not linked Your PAN is not linked to your Aadhaar. Please visit the nearest branch or merchant point to open an account Aadhaar OTP account already exists! It seems that you already have an Aadhaar OTP based account with other bank, Kindly visit the nearest merchant point to open an account with us Go to Branch Locator Dear customer, this account opening journey is not applicable for politically exposed person. By clicking on yes, you confirm that you belong to politically exposed group and you will not be allowed to proceed with the journey Mobile number mismatch with Aadhaar! There is a mismatch in the mobile number entered and Aadhaar linked mobile number Verify Aadhaar OTP Enter the OTP sent to your Aadhaar registered mobile number Add & Review Details Personal Details Gender Male Nationality Indian Father\'s / Husband\'s name Permanent address as per Aadhaar Communication address Same as permanent address Name as per PAN* DOB* Mother\'s maiden name* Marital Status* Save and proceed Professional Details Education qualification* Occupation* Annual Income* lakhs Nominee details (optional) As per RBI guidelines, it is recommended to add a nominee for financial security Nominee name* Enter nominee\'s name Date of birth* DD/MM/YYYY Relationship with account holder* Nominee address same as customer address Nominee Address* Guardian Details Guardian Name* Relation with nominee* Guardian DOB* Guardian address same as customer address Guardian Address* PIN code* State/Union territory* Skip for now Congratulations! Your e-KYC and PAN verification has been done Name mismatch in Aadhaar and PAN! To create your bank account, it is mandatory for your Aadhaar and PAN details to match Try again PAN verification failed! The details provided by you does not match with PAN Payment Video KYC Your Debit Card Use a Fino RuPay Platinum debit card to make smart purchases and to earn rewards on the go FinoPay Digital Savings Account Select name on card* Communication address as per Aadhaar Nominee details Nominee DOB Debit card details Name on Debit card Address where Debit card will be delivery I hereby agree to the Terms and Conditions laid down by the bank for the account opening process and all the details shared by me are correct. Info Dear Customer, if your communication address is different from permanent address, kindly visit our Merchant Point to open an account Continue with permanent address Locate nearest Merchant Point Your Digital Savings Account is opened successfully !! Pay annual fee and complete video KYC to avail all banking services OTT Cashback on Video KYC on Referral Payment Successful ! Here’s Your Account Details Bank A/C Number IFSC VPA for completing \nVideo KYC Checklist for Video KYC Please check and keep these documents ready Original PAN card Device with microphone & camera feature> White paper & blue/black pen Well light room with plain background I hereby provide my consent to Fino Payment Bank to fetch my KYC details using Aadhaar from UIDAI and validate my PAN from NSDL for purpose of up-gradation of minimum KYC account to Full KYC account. Start Video KYC Video KYC Timings Our Video KYC services are available from 9:30 AM to 6:30 PM, on all days Uh-Oh! An interruption \n occurred during Video KYC A technical error occurred during Video KYC. Don’t worry, you can always contact your nearby merchant and complete your KYC. Restart Video KYC I’ll do it later We have received your details successfully.\n Your Video KYC is completed successfully Refer your friends Invite your friends and earn exciting rewards Send Invitation Send your referral link to your friends Register Let them register for FinoPay After their registration, get ₹150 in your FinoPay account Referral code: Done Payment failed Please retry adding funds to \n activate your account Video KYC Pending Dear customer, Kindly complete your Video KYC before 20 Oct 2025, to keep your account active Payment Pending Dear customer, your payment towards the annual plan of your Fino Saving Account is due Pay Now Rate your experience Very Poor Poor Average Good Very Good What can we improve? Submit Digital Savings Account FinoPay would like to send you notifications Notifications may include alerts, sounds etc. These can be configured in Settings. Don’t allow Allow Retry Continue Please send us the pre-composed SMS with the activation key to fetch the linked Fino bank account. Mobile number verified Mobile number not verified Make sure your device has a SIM card You could try turning airplane mode on and off, or remove and re-insert your SIM. Mobile number verification failed There was a technical error. Device registered successfully \n\nWelcome to FinoPay, we are excited to have you! Welcome back! Customer ID Phone Please answer any three of the questions listed below to set MPIN & security questions. Enter PAN No Enter Aadhaar No Enter mother\'s maiden name Enter date of birth Enter Customer ID MPIN cannot be four consecutive numbers or same number repeated four times. Forgot MPIN? You have registered successfully Redirecting to security question… Log in using Face ID Log in using Touch ID Log in using MPIN Face ID Touch ID Use MPIN instead Cancel Enter MPIN to verify Enable Face ID Would you like to turn on Face ID for faster \n access to FinoPay app? \n You can also set this up later from the Settings menu. Enable Touch ID Would you like to turn on Touch ID for faster access to FinoPay app? \n\nYou can also set this up later from the Settings menu. Biometric login enabled and device registered successfully Redirecting to app dashboard Open your Digital Savings \nAccount with FinoPay One account, many benefits Make Utility payments Pay bills & get cashbacks Personalised offers Get personalised offers according to your spending Earn upto 6.25% Interest p.a With partner sweep account facility Complimentary lounge access Enjoy lounge access on airports with your debit card Start your banking journey with us. Your security is important to us. Please select your favourite color to get started. Please select your favourite image Your response should match the one chosen during security question setup. Forgot security answers Next Security question verified successfully Please select your favourite colour Your response should match the one chosen during security question setup. Bank account verification failed Redirecting to reset security questions… Enter old MPIN Your MPIN was reset
//My Account Basic Details Name Nominee Father/Husband name Mother maiden name Aadhaar number Pan number IFSC code Branch name Signature Contact Details KYC Status Verified Email ID Phone number Permanent address
//Sweep In Sweep Account Consent I hereby give my consent to Fino Payments Bank for sweeping my account balance from Suryoday Small Finance Bank to my Fino Payments Bank Account as per my request. I understand that balance can be sweeped in my Fino Payments Bank Account in nearest round figure only. Sweep account consent submitted successfully Your account will be opened once your\nEOD balance crosses ₹ 1,95,000. I Accept Pull Money Request Statement View Statement Enter the amount you want to add Sweep-in my entire balance Sweep from Available balance Sweep to Account Type Sweep in successful Select Sweep Account Select duration Download Current month Last 3 months Last 6 months Last year Select dates Statement emailed successfully Statement downloaded successfully To open your statement Enter first four letters of your name in lowercase, followed by your D.O.B. in DDMMYYYY format. You can expect the statement in your inbox (alexgeorge@gmail.com) in 5-10 mins Guide for Sweep Account Bank Services Click on Account Sweep in Bank\nServices Click on Account\nSweep in Click on Pull\nmoney

Sorry! Please visit the nearest merchant or\nbranch point to generate your Pin We regret to inform you that our\n services are currently down. Please try\n again after some time Card holder’s name Verify Set PIN for your Debit Card Set PIN International Usage ATM Withdrawal Min Max Merchant outlet Online payment Tap and Pay Update Transaction limits set\nsuccessfully Limit on each transaction View
//Insurance Select Insurance Buy Insurance Pay Premium Were you assisted by FINO representative? No Yes Representative Code Apply Vehicle Insurance (Private Vehicles only) Vehicle Number View Plans Health Insurance Referral code does not exist
//Loan Eligibility Criteria Occupation type Minimum monthly salary Minimum Credit Score Rate of Interest Loan Amount Loan Processing Fees Tenure Proceed By proceeding further, I confirm to have read and agreed to the Terms and Conditions. Age Loan Features Brands Kindly provide the details to apply for Home Loan PAN Mobile Number Loan Type Enter your PIN Code State City Application submitted Thank You for applying, you will get a call back from Mahindra Rural Housing Finance Lead ID Loan-to-Value
//Investment Confirm details before proceeding Enter Required Loan Amount Fino Payments Bank The selected account is inactive. Please \n choose an active account to proceed. This service is only available for \n Savings Account customers This service is only available for \n Savings Account customers Pay bill Fund transfer Account Dormant Sorry! This service is currently unavailable to you By clicking on Yes, you will be navigated to 5 Paisa website where you can open Demat Account. None of your personal details will be shared during this redirection.
However, the information provided on their website is owned and managed by 5 Paisa portal and FINO Payments Bank does not bear any responsibility for the same.
The Bank (FINO Payments Bank) is providing the referral service purely on non-risk participation basis and will not guarantee any fixed/assured return to the customers/merchants in respect of the investments being made through Partner’s (5 Paisa) platform. These terms and conditions ("Terms and Conditions") apply to and regulate for the usage of the Mutual Fund Services offered by Finwizard Technology Private Limited (FISDOM/Third Party/Mutual Fund Distributor/Intermediary) using Fino Payments Bank (“the Bank”) platform https://www.finobank.com (“website”) or Bank’s mobile application FinoPay (“App”).
By completing the sign-up process for availing any of the Services, you are deemed to have expressly read, understood and accepted each and every specific Terms and Conditions mentioned herein, along with the Fisdom – MF Terms of Service www.fisdom.com/mutual-fund-terms-of-service/ along with General Terms and Conditions specified on Mutual Fund Distributor website www.fisdom.com and amended from time to time.
In this agreement, “We”, “Us” or “Our” refers to the Fino Payments Bank. “Third Party”, “Mutual Fund Distributor” or “Intermediary” refers to Fisdom and “You” or “Your” refers to the individuals using the Bank’s platform to access Mutual Fund Services provided by Fisdom
By Proceeding with the Use of the Services, you agree as follows:
You agree and understand that the Services provided herein are only to avail Third Party Product - Mutual Fund services offered by Fisdom accessing Bank’s platform for its customers. You also agree and understand that The Bank have arrangement with Fisdom to provide products or services. In order to use these products or services, you shall be required to explicitly agree to terms and conditions of Fisdom and its privacy policy available on their platform. The acceptance of Fisdom Terms and Conditions by you for using the product or services are between you and Fisdom only. The Bank is not liable for any actions or inactions of Fisdom.
That, Fisdom is an AMFI Registered Mutual Fund Distributor and the Bank is only facilitating you to access Fisdom services at your sole discretion by using the Bank’s Platform.
Fino Bank is in referral tie up (non- risk participation) for digital mutual fund platform with FISDOM (Finwizard Technology Pvt Ltd). Through this tie up, we provide an opportunity to our customers to diversify their investment portfolios, depending on their requirements and risk appetite. Fino Bank makes no warranties or representations, express or implied, on products offered through the platform. It accepts no liability for any damages or losses, however caused, in connection with the use of, or on the reliance of its product or related services.
Fino Bank/Mutual Fund Partner reserve the right to modify/ change all or any of the

//Digital Gold Discover FinoPay services Explore more with Fino T&C Apply* Below details will be shared with SafeGold "I hereby give my consent to Fino Payments Bank for enabling a sweep account facility with Suryoday Small Finance Bank linked with my Bank account. I confirm that I have read the product features and agree with the same. I also provide my explicit consent to Fino Payments Bank for sharing my KYC information to SSFB." Full Name Pincode Powered By I hereby provide my consent for sharing my name, email, mobile, pan, pincode and last 4 digit of Aadhaar with digital India private limited(Safegold) for the purpose of using its Digital Gold Services. I am informed that this is third party offering provided by SafeGold and Fino Payment Bank is merely being a payment facilitator in the entire scope of services I agree Savings Locker Details Quantity Worth Today Search by category or request Id Buy live rate /gm Product ID Description : 5 gram safegold bar(99.99%) Metal Weight Brand name Type of metal Making charges . Safegold coins are set in 24 Karat yellow gold \n\n.Guaranteed weight and purity: specially manufactured in state of the art facilities, with zero negative tolerance for weight and purity.\n\n.Sealed in international quality packaging with a unique serial number, ensures foolproof quality and complete traceability for each coin Current Balance Insufficient gold balance Track Delivery unavailable On this pincode delivery service is not available Delivery Address Area, colony, road Town/City District Country\n Select Quantity View T&C Highlights Estimated dispatch GST Charges Ministing cost Your gold delivery request is submitted successfully. completed Delivery details New locker balance transaction ID Address Expected date of delivery Buy Price : GMS Minimum amount should not be less then ₹50 I agree to the Terms and Conditions Uh oh! Payment failed Check your internet connection.\n\nYou can try again in a while. Buy Gold Price Debit from FAQs Pay Things to consider Sell Gold Sell Price : Empty locker Selling Amount Charges Receivable Amount Credit to Sell order Details Gold weight Gold rate Total amount Date & Time Download Invoice Delivery Status Message Tracker ID Courier company Tracking link Enter FINO employee or merchant code Success Terms & Conditions
